(Would the Infecticon beam hit those of us battling outside of the 
city...?)


Hot Spot fired off a fireball Megatron, tired of waiting for Prowl to 
get out of the way.

Groove gets hit by Spasstik, sending him crashing to the ground.

Blades finished his turn, firing off ten 30mm shells off at Soundwave.

Streetwise wondered what the hell had hit him as he swerved, 
reverting to biped mode looking around for who or whatever had hit 
the top of his police car form.

First Aid watched the battle (YAWN).
